data.name: XDragGestureListener
desc: This interface will be used by a XDragGestureRecognizer when it detects a drag initiating gesture.
The implementor of this interface is responsible for starting the drag as a result of receiving such notification.

methods.name: dragGestureRecognized
desc: A XDragGestureRecognizer has detected a platform-dependent drag initiating gesture and is notifying this listener in order for it to initiate the action for the user.
